title: Champ select glitch or what not?
body: In champ select, picked champ, booted due to not selecting a champ. It can't be that I forgot to lock in or anything, because this was a blind.

replies.body:
Hmmm, it sounds like the matchmaking server didn't see that you had locked in. This commonly occurs as a result of a *poor* or *unstable connection* to our servers, most often because of conflicting network settings that just plain don't play nicely with League. Our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will walk you through configuring your network settings so they're the most compatible with League.

If you experience further issues w/ this after taking the steps in that guide, just let me know so we can further troubleshoot this together.
